name: Boats Afloat
description:
Two convicts have been sentenced to the clouds with only their cloud drifter as a tool. Only one can go free... Break the other's cloud drifter and regain your freedom!

Destroy parts of your own ship and use them as projectiles. But don't forget: Playing too aggresive can lead to your own downfall! 

Boats Afloat team:

  • Larissa
  • Jade
  • Brik
  • Dimitri
